definitions: a computer program with a graphical user interface for displaying and navigating between web pages
shortDefinitions: computer program with graphical user interface

definitions: a person who looks casually through books or magazines or at things for sale

examples.text: a wonderful array of shops that will keep any browser amused for hours

shortDefinitions: person who looks through publications or goods

definitions: an animal that feeds mainly on high-growing vegetation

examples.text: roe deer are browsers, living throughout the year in dense woodland

shortDefinitions: animal which feeds mainly on high-growing vegetation
